LanguageData.VRE_FungalCrest.label: грибний гребінець
LanguageData.VRE_FungalCrest.description: Carriers of this gene grow a large, colorful fungal crest protruding from the top of their head.
LanguageData.VRE_HairMushroom.label: грибне волосся
LanguageData.VRE_HairMushroom.description: Carriers of this gene have a particular hair color. With multiple hair color genes, one is randomly selected.
